Text: I went to this site today and found a really strange christiany comment on it. Seriously what the hell was that? She wants to "save" us, thats just crap and she went and deleted alot of hardwork by alot of people, ive written a story i wanted to submit to her, do you know of any popular sites i culd give my story to i spent 2 years writing? lol you are a hero i really wanted to read through some of these stories that i havent read in years. Thanks!
